Catherine Connelly

  1. Foster Name: Karen
  2. Foster Family: Stephen and Mary Schrage
  3. Location of Family: Raeville, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society or Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 23 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-01-09, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1980-09-02, Elgin, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Catherine Henkenius
  11. Spouse Name: Wilfred Henkenius
  12. Source: Charlotte [Endoud] Corres.; Elgin Centennial (Elgin, NE); 1920 United States Federal Census; The Elgin Review, 10 September 1980.
